script:
1). Did you remember to call Ms. Epstein?
I did called him.
Oh no. I'm afraid I didn't. 
I'll remind you to call.
2). Didn't they guarantee delivery by Thursday?
I did leave my keys at home.
That's right. They didn't.
They sure did. 
3). Don't forget your doctor's appointment.
I didn't remember to go.
Thanks for reminding me. 
Hey, you too!
